QuestData.Title: A Worthy Brew
QuestData.Description: There's one final person who needs to taste my brew.$B$BI've heard that he's traveled far and wide, and tasted drinks from all over the world.$B$BHe happens to be in town, and I'd like to know what he thinks of my skills.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ask Chen Stormstout to taste Ella's Brew.
